title: Exploiting synergies in barley research
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Project has just started. Kelly houston has benefitted from 3 months in Adelaide working in the centre of excellence in plant cell walls and Ali Hassan from the CoE has spent six weeks in Dundee. Further exchange visits are planned for the coming year. For Kelly in particular this has been a fantastic learning experience. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Energy
